abstract: James Woolery, a Cravath lawyer turned JPMorgan investment banker, discusses the prospects for mergers and acquisitions with the Deal Professor.
snippet: James Woolery, a Cravath lawyer turned JPMorgan investment banker, discusses the prospects for mergers and acquisitions with the Deal Professor.
lead_paragraph: Earlier this year, James C. Woolery left one of the plum legal jobs in the world, as a partner at Cravath, Swaine & Moore, to become the co-head of North America mergers and acquisitions alongside Chris Ventresca at JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: James Woolery of JPMorgan Surveys the M.&A. Scene
